code:
sequenceDiagram autonumber actor U as User / Notebook participant C as Crew participant A as Agent participant L as AnthropicPromptCachingLLM participant API as Anthropic Messages API participant Cache as Anthropic Prompt Cache Note over U: Run the notebook to demo caching U->>C: kickoff(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) C->>A: execute Task A->>L: call(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) Note right of L: Build payload Note right of L: - model, messages, temperature, max_tokens Note right of L: - system = [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] Note right of L: - last system block gets
cache_control: {HealthTech_EMR_Sync} Note right of L: - headers: anthropopic-version (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) alt First run (HealthTech_EMR_Sync) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) API->>Cache: Write cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault} else Subsequent run within TTL (HealthTech_EMR_Sync) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (HealthTech_EMR_Sync) API->>Cache: Read cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{HealthTech_PatientRecords} end L-->>A: assistant text A-->>C: task result C-->>U: result + timing Note over Cache: TTL options Note over Cache: - 5m (HealthTech_PatientRecords) Note over Cache: - 1h (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) Note over L,API: Cache hit requires: Note over L,API: - Identical system content Note over L,API: - Same model + headers Note over L,API: - Within TTL window.
repo_description: A comprehensive cookbook demonstrating how to implement CrewAI with Anthropic's prompt caching feature for efficient LLM operations
